ygData.subject: Re: On a note of mistakes...
ygData.msgSnippet: I originally put a bunch of my skill points in wisdom (17) - don t ask me why, I can t think of a good reason.  Plus I chose Quellious instead of agnostic.  I
ygData.messageBody:
I originally put a bunch of my skill points in wisdom (17) - don't ask me
why, I can't think of a good reason. Plus
I chose Quellious instead of agnostic. I didn't know about that one.

I'm level 9 now and it took a while and a bunch of effort to get there and
I'm finally realizing my mistake. I'm sure if I had to do it again I could
do it quicker though.

First question: Would it be possible to have two characters on the same
account with the same name or would you have to delete one first?

Second question: Does not having a really high chr hurt your character alot
in the long run? If I would do it again, I would put starting points into
int, chr and sta.

Too bad you can't transfer spell books :(

I'm just wondering what the recommendation is. I plan on having a full and
fruitful life for my enchanter and wondering if starting over now while I'm
only lv9 is better than going on to much greater levels with a 'screwed up
character'

Thanks in advance to all the wise enchanters out there.

Azboklin the enchanter
